title: LF Duo or Team OCE to climbXD
body:
So I've put in a ton of hours preseason to improve myself. I was a support main (Leona) for a few years but can now play mid (Ekko), ADC (Jhin) or JG quite well so I'm happy to fill.

So if your looking for a partner or team mate and don't mind that I'm streaming 'The Climb' out of bronze feel free to contact me.

Side note it would be great if you have a mic & Discord! ðŸ¤“

replies.body: Added you in game, looking forward in chats.
